creator: martin.keller@unitedplanet.de
text:
It's documented, that "skip" is the default value for the whenempty attribute.
That's not true, the default is "create". Setting the whenempty attribute to
"skip" does not work. It's quite annoying, that a jar file is created when no
files are matched.

creator: peterreilly@apache.org
text:
This has been fixed in ant svn (for 1.7)
by having the new attribute whenmanifestonly
